pkgmetadata.longdescription: Useful Tools for Scientific Research // Utilities that help researchers in various phases of their research work. This package offer a function that automate the exploratory data analysis, a function for the generation of Table 1 (required on many epidemiological papers) which can be exported to excel. There is also a function for generation of a forestplot with a table and relative risks or odds ratios that can be used for publication. Additionally, there is a function that generates train/test random partitions used for model evaluation that checks for the balance of the partitions.
